views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 12

When you click Wifi bars it turns off wifi, Cellular bars turns on wifi, Battery turns on/off low power mode, Airplane turns off airplane mode, Swipe right on status bar to increase brightness by %10, Swipe left to decrease brightness by 10% (Brightness swipes only work in springboard) and long press on any of them to go to corresponding settings pages.

No options to configure.

No Screenshots for this item.
